summary: net/mlx5: E-Switch, pair only capable devices
details:
net/mlx5: E-Switch, pair only capable devices

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit cdbcdddb8076a09aa6ddaf20fd911fc787dca0e5, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit dd3fddb82780bfa24124834edd90bbc63bd689cc. For more details please see the references link.
